title: The Killing of Freddie Gray, Episode 5 â€“ Evidence: Knife, Blood, Van
description:
April 3, 2017 / The hard evidence in this case, the knife and the van, have become characters in the story of Freddie Gray. We reveal their legal significance and their importance in the investigation.

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Fleslit, H-LR, Jahzzar, Remain, and Uncanny Valleys.

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie
